About Robinhood:

Robinhood is the worldâ€™s leading commission-free brokerage application. With an organically grown user-base of over 1M and $30B in transactions since our 2015 launch, we are the fastest growing brokerage in history. Through exceptionally engineered systems and award-winning design, Robinhood democratizes access to the financial markets and simplifies trading for the 99%.
